title: Fora Travel Pop-Up (SoHo)
perks: Immersive travel theme, quiet interior, artistic displays
description: Step into a reimagined travel pop-up — design-rich, slow-paced, and full of sonic detail.
aiSummary: A sound-sensitive travel exhibit in SoHo with immersive backdrops and soft acoustic layers.
studioNotes: Perfect for contact mics or low-volume field mics. Look for resonant installations.
